data.name: Japanese - Work Book - Verbs
data.detailed_description:
This Japanese workbook was designed to make the game more accessible for complete beginners.

It includes all the verbs for JLPT N5.
In addition, it also has a brief synopsis of the modifications you need to use these verbs in all the grammatical structures of JLPT N5. It forms the bedrock of Japanese language proficiency.

You may also print this out as a study guide and write on paper, or you may write on-screen within the app itself.

Happy learning
data.about_the_game:
This Japanese workbook was designed to make the game more accessible for complete beginners.

It includes all the verbs for JLPT N5.
In addition, it also has a brief synopsis of the modifications you need to use these verbs in all the grammatical structures of JLPT N5. It forms the bedrock of Japanese language proficiency.

You may also print this out as a study guide and write on paper, or you may write on-screen within the app itself.

data.short_description: Japanese Workbook Verbs includes all the verbs for JLPT N5, which Japanese Romaji Adventure will teach you and you need to complete the game.
